/usr/bin/c++     -ftemplate-depth-50 -fno-tree-vectorize -fPIC -fPIC -g     -lpthread CMakeFiles/controller.dir/controller.o  -o controller  -L/home/yuting/Desktop/OpenIGTLink-build/bin  -L/home/yuting/Desktop/MTest/ROB-build  -L/usr/local/lib -rdynamic libMrsvrCom.a libMrsvrCtrl.a -lm libfbisim.a libMrsvrCom.a -Wl,-rpath,/home/yuting/Desktop/OpenIGTLink-build/bin:/home/yuting/Desktop/MTest/ROB-build:/usr/local/lib
